titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress regarding elimination of the portion of the national debt held by the public by 2015 or earlier.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 2/1/2000--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress that Congress and the President should work together to eliminate the portion of the national debt held by the public by 2015 or earlier.
